summary: Sidekick of a Superstar - Chapter 52 Detroit
title: Sidekick of a Superstar - Chapter 52 Detroit
body:
I hope you guys waited for this. I love how’s the story going (because I know where we are going) Hope you love it too! Feedback is always appreciated! It can be a Like, a Comment, a Reblog or an Ask, whatever it is, I’m happy :)

Word count: 1.3k

Lookbook

Detroit look

Series Masterpost

MAIN MASTERLIST

Next day was a day off and things seemed to change a bit. Harry acted totally normal like when you first met and he was an absolute gentleman. He was just generously nice. He didn’t show he was suffering. But for you he did his best.

You were out with Hélène taking photos then you went grocery shopping in the afternoon with Lottie. You felt a bit weird not buying for Harry too.

“Never shop with a pregnant woman with cravings,” she told you.

“It’s on Harry and he loves pregnant women. I think you can get away with it,” you chuckled.

“Is it really that bad between you two?”

“Lottie, I told you already. I need time and I’m pretty sure he needs to think about things too.”

“I know, it’s just sad to look at you both. And I can’t even do things with the both of you at the same time”

“What do you mean?”

“He asked me if I want to have a friendly dinner with him tonight.”

“So?”

“I said I can’t.”

“But you want to”

“Yeah, I mean, we became friends through the phone calls we had. He cares a lot about me and I guess I owe him a dinner.”

“Then go!”

“But wouldn’t it hurt you?”

“I’m an adult I can find a program for myself if my best friend is not available.”

“Fine. I’ll go then.”

“Good.” It didn’t feel weird with Lottie. It was a normal thing that day have some common things. Harry loved her as a friend. Your friend. And Lottie has always been a huge fan of Louis and Niall, not Harry, so you weren’t afraid of her stealing your boy. But was him your boy any more? You need to find that out. When you got back, Lottie went to eat with Harry and you were in your room reading. She came back after two hours.

“Hey! I thought you’re asleep” she said as she walked in.

“No, I never sleep before midnight. It’s a side effect of touring. The concerts always end later. How was the evening?”

“It was really good, we caught up on things and I had to tell everything about my pregnancy. He even asked me if he can hold my belly”

“Did you let him?” You chuckled.

“Yeah, he was too nice. But it’s not that big yet so there’s not too much to hold actually.”

“I’m sure he enjoyed it though.”

“He did.” you two giggled.

The next day you got a message from Jeff.

“5SOS will visit today. Can you give them a tour?”

“What the heck?” you mumbled to yourself. You havent met them, but Harry told you earlier that Luke has a thing for you. Jeff didn’t tell you, but Harry was also asked to get them around. So when you get to the back door at the given time you found Harry.

“Oh, hey!”

“Hi!” he waved awkwardly.

“You’re waiting for them?” You asked and realized how dumb this question was, but at least it saved you from a more awkward silence.

“Yeah, Jeff asked me to do a tour for them,” he said.

“What? Jeff asked me too for that,” you were surprised.

“Oh.”

“I guess we can split up, so we don’t have to go all together,” you suggested.

“Yeah, sure, we can totally split from each other, I mean in this, touring ….them, you know…”

“Yeah, totally.”

“Heeeeey!” You heard someone open the door. It was Ash. They all hugged you and you told them that the tour with be split up and they seemed to be very happy about it. Luke and Ash specifically chose to go with you.

Luke and Ashton followed you as you started to talk about your work and the tour. Harry, Michael and Calum stayed behind in a seeing distance.

“So why didn’t you chose them to get a great behind the curtain show by y/n?” Harry asked them. Calum started to explain.

“The thing is. They both have a crush on her. And now they’re both trying to impress her.”

“We made bets, which one of them takes her on a date” Michael added. Harry’s eyes went wide open. That was the last thing he wanted to hear. But he needed to be chill.

“And what if she doesn’t pick?” Harry asked.

“Oh, she will. Ashton said, if she doesn’t seem to choose him, he’s gonna kiss her or something. You know… to get overwhelmed by him” they laughed. Harry didn’t.

“…so we became good friends fast, which makes easier to work with him” you said.

“Do you have a boyfriend?” Luke asked. You got nervous.

“That’s none of your business.” you said. Ashton smirked.

“Luke, don’t be an ass. She’s a lady. You don’t ask that from a lady like this” he said and wrapped his arm around your shoulder.

“And how do you like the work so far?” Ashton asked.

“We’ll, that’s a question I’m gonna answer. I love it, the band, the crew, the audience are amazing…” you went on talking about your work. Harry hissed when he saw that Ashton’s arm is around your shoulder and soon it was on your waist. The boys saw that he’s intense.

“Why are you pissed, Harry? I can see it on you” Michael said.

“It’s just… I don’t want anyone to hit on her” he admitted.

“Don’t worry, bro. They’re all single adults. You’re not her dad anyway. You act like that” he chuckled. “But she’s mine” Harry thought.

“Man, she’s gonna go home with one of them tonight” Calum said. Harry wasn’t so happy, but tried to take it as a joke. Your relationship wasn’t that strong at the moment. He trusted you, but he didn’t trust the boys.

You had to go back to your dressing room to finish some paperwork for Jeff. Harry was with the boys and the band. Ten minutes into the chatting, he realized Luke has gone missing.

You sat by the table in your room when someone knocked on the door.

“Hey!” you saw Luke peeking his head inside. “Can I come in?”

“Yeah” you smiled.

“I just forgot to say that we saw the little video you made, when you covered Lie to Me with Mitch and Sarah” he smiled as he sat down on the chair next to you.

“Thanks! It was really just a little fun. But. I felt that song so much at that time, it screamed for being covered” you chuckled.

“You changed the lyrics even” he leaned a bit closer.

“Yeah…” you were cut off saying anything because he put his lips on yours and started kissing you. His hand was on your cheek fast as he tried to deepen the kiss. You pulled away.

“Sorry. That was fast” he said.

“It’s hard to kiss when someone else is on your mind”

“Oh. I see. So you have a boyfriend”

“I can’t confirm nor deny. It’s complicated” you chuckled. “But I wanna keep a promise to someone”

“Of course. And sorry for attacking you”

“Let’s forget this, okay?”

“Okay” he said and Harry opened the door without knocking.

“There you are, Luke. You escaped so quietly.” Harry said.

“Yeah, I just wanted to compliment y/n’s cover of Lie to Me. I love it,” Luke said.

“Guys are missing you, we still have a stack of beer to have,” Luke stood up and Harry waited until he left the room.

“I’ll be there in a minute,” he shouted after him and closed the door.

“You alright?” He asked you.

“Why shouldn’t I be?” You smiled.

“I stood by the door for a while before I came in,” he admitted and looked down.

“Oh, yeah, I’m fine.”

“Was it uh…. Nevermind.” He said and turned around to leave.

“Yes, it was you.” You said quickly. He looked at you and smiled. It was sad, but it was true.

“Thank you,” he said and left.

Later the same routine was done, you got your matching clothes, took some pictures with Harry and he left for the concert. Lottie was out in the crowd tonight, but you didn’t go with her. 

Harry found not just one, but two pregnant women in the crowd. She was talking to one, but couldn’t miss to mention Lottie. Luckily he found her. He was the sweetest guy for her. He made her feel special and important in front of thousands of people. You actually loved their friendship, like they were brother and sister. Harry would’ve done anything to protect her, and she would’ve kicked his ass when he was a jerk. They didn’t have romance, they had a pure friendship.

You were thinking about what happened and got lost in thoughts when someone hugged you from behind. You almost jumped and turned around.

“Hey! Sorry for scaring you,” Louis said.

“Louis!” you hugged him. You were happy he’s there. “How can you be here? Shouldn’t you be in London doing the X-Factor?”

“Auditions are done and I had some free time. Where’s Lottie?”

“Out somewhere. Wanna find her?”

“No, I hear it’s Kiwi now, I’ll wait until she’s back.”

When the concert ended, the boys went out all together but you decided to stay in the hotel.

“Yeah, I mean, we became friends through the phone calls we had. He cares a lot about me and I guess I owe him a dinner.”

“Then go!”

“But wouldn’t it hurt you?”

“I’m an adult I can find a program for myself if my best friend is not available.”

“Fine. I’ll go then.”

“Good.” It didn’t feel weird with Lottie. It was a normal thing that day have some common things. Harry loved her as a friend. Your friend. And Lottie has always been a huge fan of Louis and Niall, not Harry, so you weren’t afraid of her stealing your boy. But was him your boy any more? You need to find that out. When you got back, Lottie went to eat with Harry and you were in your room reading. She came back after two hours.

“Hey! I thought you’re asleep” she said as she walked in.

“No, I never sleep before midnight. It’s a side effect of touring. The concerts always end later. How was the evening?”

“It was really good, we caught up on things and I had to tell everything about my pregnancy. He even asked me if he can hold my belly”

“Did you let him?” You chuckled.

“Yeah, he was too nice. But it’s not that big yet so there’s not too much to hold actually.”

“I’m sure he enjoyed it though.”

“He did.” you two giggled.

The next day you got a message from Jeff.

“5SOS will visit today. Can you give them a tour?”

“What the heck?” you mumbled to yourself. You havent met them, but Harry told you earlier that Luke has a thing for you. Jeff didn’t tell you, but Harry was also asked to get them around. So when you get to the back door at the given time you found Harry.

“Oh, hey!”

“Hi!” he waved awkwardly.

“You’re waiting for them?” You asked and realized how dumb this question was, but at least it saved you from a more awkward silence.

“Yeah, Jeff asked me to do a tour for them,” he said.

“What? Jeff asked me too for that,” you were surprised.

“Oh.”

“I guess we can split up, so we don’t have to go all together,” you suggested.

“Yeah, sure, we can totally split from each other, I mean in this, touring ….them, you know…”

“Yeah, totally.”

“Heeeeey!” You heard someone open the door. It was Ash. They all hugged you and you told them that the tour with be split up and they seemed to be very happy about it. Luke and Ash specifically chose to go with you.

Luke and Ashton followed you as you started to talk about your work and the tour. Harry, Michael and Calum stayed behind in a seeing distance.

“So why didn’t you chose them to get a great behind the curtain show by y/n?” Harry asked them. Calum started to explain.

“The thing is. They both have a crush on her. And now they’re both trying to impress her.”

“We made bets, which one of them takes her on a date” Michael added. Harry’s eyes went wide open. That was the last thing he wanted to hear. But he needed to be chill.

“And what if she doesn’t pick?” Harry asked.

“Oh, she will. Ashton said, if she doesn’t seem to choose him, he’s gonna kiss her or something. You know… to get overwhelmed by him” they laughed. Harry didn’t.

“…so we became good friends fast, which makes easier to work with him” you said.

“Do you have a boyfriend?” Luke asked. You got nervous.

“That’s none of your business.” you said. Ashton smirked.

“Luke, don’t be an ass. She’s a lady. You don’t ask that from a lady like this” he said and wrapped his arm around your shoulder.

“And how do you like the work so far?” Ashton asked.

“We’ll, that’s a question I’m gonna answer. I love it, the band, the crew, the audience are amazing…” you went on talking about your work. Harry hissed when he saw that Ashton’s arm is around your shoulder and soon it was on your waist. The boys saw that he’s intense.

“Why are you pissed, Harry? I can see it on you” Michael said.

“It’s just… I don’t want anyone to hit on her” he admitted.

“Don’t worry, bro. They’re all single adults. You’re not her dad anyway. You act like that” he chuckled. “But she’s mine” Harry thought.

“Man, she’s gonna go home with one of them tonight” Calum said. Harry wasn’t so happy, but tried to take it as a joke. Your relationship wasn’t that strong at the moment. He trusted you, but he didn’t trust the boys.

You had to go back to your dressing room to finish some paperwork for Jeff. Harry was with the boys and the band. Ten minutes into the chatting, he realized Luke has gone missing.

You sat by the table in your room when someone knocked on the door.

“Hey!” you saw Luke peeking his head inside. “Can I come in?”

“Yeah” you smiled.

“I just forgot to say that we saw the little video you made, when you covered Lie to Me with Mitch and Sarah” he smiled as he sat down on the chair next to you.

“Thanks! It was really just a little fun. But. I felt that song so much at that time, it screamed for being covered” you chuckled.

“You changed the lyrics even” he leaned a bit closer.

“Yeah…” you were cut off saying anything because he put his lips on yours and started kissing you. His hand was on your cheek fast as he tried to deepen the kiss. You pulled away.

“Sorry. That was fast” he said.

“It’s hard to kiss when someone else is on your mind”

“Oh. I see. So you have a boyfriend”

“I can’t confirm nor deny. It’s complicated” you chuckled. “But I wanna keep a promise to someone”

“Of course. And sorry for attacking you”

“Let’s forget this, okay?”

“Okay” he said and Harry opened the door without knocking.

“There you are, Luke. You escaped so quietly.” Harry said.

“Yeah, I just wanted to compliment y/n’s cover of Lie to Me. I love it,” Luke said.

“Guys are missing you, we still have a stack of beer to have,” Luke stood up and Harry waited until he left the room.

“I’ll be there in a minute,” he shouted after him and closed the door.

“You alright?” He asked you.

“Why shouldn’t I be?” You smiled.

“I stood by the door for a while before I came in,” he admitted and looked down.

“Oh, yeah, I’m fine.”

“Was it uh…. Nevermind.” He said and turned around to leave.

“Yes, it was you.” You said quickly. He looked at you and smiled. It was sad, but it was true.

“Thank you,” he said and left.

Later the same routine was done, you got your matching clothes, took some pictures with Harry and he left for the concert. Lottie was out in the crowd tonight, but you didn’t go with her. 

Harry found not just one, but two pregnant women in the crowd. She was talking to one, but couldn’t miss to mention Lottie. Luckily he found her. He was the sweetest guy for her. He made her feel special and important in front of thousands of people. You actually loved their friendship, like they were brother and sister. Harry would’ve done anything to protect her, and she would’ve kicked his ass when he was a jerk. They didn’t have romance, they had a pure friendship.

You were thinking about what happened and got lost in thoughts when someone hugged you from behind. You almost jumped and turned around.

“Hey! Sorry for scaring you,” Louis said.

“Louis!” you hugged him. You were happy he’s there. “How can you be here? Shouldn’t you be in London doing the X-Factor?”

“Auditions are done and I had some free time. Where’s Lottie?”

“Out somewhere. Wanna find her?”

“No, I hear it’s Kiwi now, I’ll wait until she’s back.”

When the concert ended, the boys went out all together but you decided to stay in the hotel.

This is a cross stitch kit to create the design shown in the picture. The pattern is charted with DMC embroidery floss and easy and fun to stitch!

The kit includes:

  • a colour print of the “Treat people with kindness” pattern
  • a 6 inch wooden embroidery hoop
  • all the embroidery threads you need for this project
  • a square of 14 count aida fabric

summary: ah, 2015... the good old days. it's summer, i've got nothing to do so i sit in my room and watch one direction vines everyday...
body:
ah, 2015… the good old days.

it’s summer, i’ve got nothing to do so i sit in my room and watch one direction vines everyday and cry about zayn leaving.

i can’t seem to choose between the so many lockscreens of one direction i’ve saved to my phone. my password is zayn’s birth year and i’ve just gotten a job. summer is amazing. life is good.

summary:
Inspired by “Sign of the Times”  
I would say the level of difficulty for this project is intermediate 
because of all the...
caption:
Inspired by “Sign of the Times”

I would say the level of difficulty for this project is intermediate because of all the backstitches and because there is lots of counting to be done to make sure the leaves are at the right places. So if you’re looking for a little cross stitch challenge - this is the right kit for you!

You could also just get the pattern as a pdf file if you don’t need the materials.

Shop: https://stitchasong.bigcartel.com/
